name: Süleyman! He's the man!
description:
It's your first day of work and Süleyman's there to help you out!

--

This VN was created to be a sample for our B&W VN Commissions.
Like the base package, it includes:

  • 1 sprite with 4 expressions
  • a simple BG
  • ~1500 words and 2 choices
  • 1 ending
  • a title screen from one of our templates

This VN commission would cost $ 230.

--

If you would like to commission us to make a VN for you, please click here!

--

Due to server issues, the game might be slow when playing with browser.
If the browser version of the game is too slow, please download the .zip file to play it on your device.

--
